newsitem.title: USA: Colonial Properties buys $34.5 mln mall.
newsitem.headline: Colonial Properties buys $34.5 mln mall.

text.p: Colonial Properties Trust said on Wednesday that it had bought Birmingham's Brookwood Village shopping mall and convenience center from the Berkshire Realty Co for $34.5 million.
Colonial said it funded the acquisition of the 700,000-square-foot mall through the exchange of two multifamily properties in Florida and an advance on the company's credit line.
Colonial also said the purchase price represented a capitalization rate of 10.03 percent.
"This is a prime real estate that is about to get even more valuable after we implement the planned improvements we'll announce shortly," said Colonial president and chief executive Thomas Lowder.
Colonial Properties Trust is a real estate investment trust that, through its subsidiaries, owns a portfolio of 77 multifamily, retail, and office properties.
